scripts.surge: docker run --rm -e NPM_CONFIG_LOGLEVEL=warn -e APP_VERSION="0.1.$(git rev-list --count HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 0)" -v "$(pwd):/app" -w /app node:22-alpine sh -c "npm ci --no-audit --prefer-offline && npm run build" && npx surge dist pick-my-degree.surge.sh
scripts.test: docker run --rm -e NPM_CONFIG_LOGLEVEL=warn -v "$(pwd):/app" -w /app node:20-alpine sh -c "npm ci --no-audit --prefer-offline && npx vitest run"
scripts.test:coverage: docker run --rm -e NPM_CONFIG_LOGLEVEL=warn -v "$(pwd):/app" -w /app node:20-alpine sh -c "npm ci --no-audit --prefer-offline && npx vitest run --coverage"
scripts.double-descriptions: docker run --rm -e NPM_CONFIG_LOGLEVEL=warn -v "$(pwd):/app" -w /app node:20-alpine sh -c "npm ci --no-audit --prefer-offline && npm run double-descriptions:local"
